prev.excerpt:
Getting started A web view can be embedded in any DoubleDutch event app via the DoubleDutch CMS. Layout > Add New Section > Web View Insert the URL of the web page to load. HTTPS is preferred. It can be an existing web page such as a
 Twitter feed…

Mobile Images base-64 encoding workaround DoubleDutch extensions are deployed as pure Javascript over the air, so directly bundling
images is not supported. A workaround is to base-64 encode smaller images and paste into
your Javascript. This site…
